title: Random FPS Drops During Games (Normally During Teamfights)
body:
I have around 250+ fps constantly, but using some abilities or being in a teamfight will sometimes cause my fps to dip to around 30fps.
 Here is a list of my computer specs:
i7-4790K 4.0GHz
16bg RAM
GTX 770
2TB Hard drive

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, this could be caused be the Game DVR feature inside the Xbox app being enabled by the recent Anniversary updates. I suggest quickly [disabling the feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it causes any change in your FPS.

Let me know the results of that change.
